title: Jeremy Kyle's ex-wife says au pair 'STOLE her look and her husband' and reveals how she was betrayed by her 'best friend'
text:
TV Magazine NANNY MCTHIEF Jeremy Kyle’s ex-wife says au pair ‘STOLE her look and her husband’ and reveals how she was betrayed by her ‘best friend’ 
How former wife of TV host Jeremy Kyle was betrayed by her 'best friend' who worked with the family for nine years Exclusive
